links.title: ApeCloud
links.tooltip: Improved productivity, cost-efficiency and business continuity.

links.title: KubeBlocks
links.tooltip: An open-source and cloud-neutral DBaaS with Kubernetes.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance)(
  sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance) (rate(vtgate_api_error_counts{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}[1m])))
/
sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance)(
  sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance)(rate(vtgate_api_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}[1m])))

sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, db_type)(
  sum by(namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, db_type)(rate(vtgate_api_error_counts{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}[1m]))
)
/
sum by (namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, db_type)(
  sum by(namespace, app_kubernetes_io_instance, db_type)(rate(vtgate_api_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_instance=~"$cluster"}[1m]))
)

panels.description:
Kills reports the queries and transactions killed by VTTablet due to timeout.
Its a very important variable to look at during outages.
panels.title: Queries Killed

panels.description: number of available connections in the pool in real-time
panels.title: Available Connections

panels.description: count of in use connections to mysql
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: rate of closing connections due to the idle timeout
panels.title: Idle Closed Rate

panels.description: WaitCount will give you how often the transaction pool gets full that causes new transactions to wait.
panels.title: Wait count

panels.description: WaitTime/WaitCount will tell you the average wait time.
panels.title: Avg wait time

panels.description: number of available connections in the pool
panels.title: Available Connections

panels.description: Number of connections actually open to mysql
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Rate of closing connections due to the idle timeout
panels.title: Idle Closed Rate

panels.description: WaitCount will give you how often the transaction pool gets full that causes new transactions to wait.
panels.title: Wait count

panels.description: WaitTime/WaitCount will tell you the average wait time.
panels.title: Avg wait time

panels.description: Shows a heatmap of the histogram bucketing of the time per read query.
panels.title: Query Time Distribution (Heatmap)
